title: Entertainment Live: The Voice hires new coaches; Stephen Lewis tributes - BBC News
summary: news and updates for friday 14 august 2015 .
cilla black death ruled accidental by coroner .
boy george and paloma faith join the voice .
rihanna to appear on us version of show .

documents.title: that 's your lot
text: that 's all we have time for today , and this week .

but we 'll be back on monday to bring you lots more news from the world of arts and entertainment , as well as a report from the bbc sherlock prom that is set to bring a touch of conan doyle to the albert hall this sunday .
elementary , my dear watson .
author: Neil Smith
Arts reporter

documents.title: hollywood hijack
text: you know how it is - you 're a celebrity in hollywood and you need a ride somewhere , but you do n't have any transportation .
so what do you do ?
you hijack a tmz tour bus and get them to drive you !
that 's what nick jonas did while out on sunset boulevard , to the delight of the showbiz-hungry bus passengers .
he even took them to his brother joe 's house , where he randomly handed out bananas - presumably a reflection of the situation he found himself in .

documents.title: blood protest piece goes to washington
text: a washington museum is to exhibit a sculpture that uses the blood of nine gay , bisexual and transgender men to protest the ban on blood donations from men who have sex with other men .

jordan eagles ' 7 foot ( 2.1m ) tall blood mirror is a three-sided rectangle that will allow visitors to step inside it and see themselves reflected through the blood , which is encased in resin to preserve it .
the american university museum is exhibiting the piece from 12 september as a protest of the ongoing federal policy .

`` this is a way of drawing attention to what is no longer really acceptable - that you ca n't discriminate against people by virtue of their sexual orientation , '' said museum director jack rasmussen .

documents.title: 'not a political statement '
text: the bbc 's head of religion and ethics has published a blog post in which he defends filming a songs of praise episode at a calais migrant camp .

the programme , aaqil ahmed writes , was not intended as `` a political statement '' but was `` simply reflecting the conversations going on in many churches and christian households around the country '' .
songs of praise is not only about christian music .
it also explores contemporary issues and modern themes from a christian perspective . ''
read the full blog and read more on this story .

documents.title: where heroes went wrong
text: heroes creator tim kring has been talking about the new heroes reborn series , which is due to air next month in the us .
the show lost many fans along the way before it ended in 2010 , partly due to its meandering and drawn-out storylines .
heroes reborn - which up five years on from where the original series left off - will only be 13 episodes , something kring admitted feeling relief about at a hollywood press event on thursday .
i think the biggest pitfall for us always was the amount of story that we had to tell in a year .
but with 13 episodes it means that we can tell this very aggressive form of storytelling .
and by that , i mean putting what i say 50 pounds of story into a 10-pound bag .
and it 's what gives the show and the audience this kind of exhilarating feeling at the end of every episode where they ca n't believe they 've seen that much story happen .

some familiar faces will be returning for the new show , including mindreader matt parkman ( greg grunberg ) , the haitian ( jimmy jean-louis ) , hiro nakamura ( masi oka ) and noah bennet ( jack coleman ) .
they will be joined by newcomers including zachary levi and judi shekoni .
the new cast posed for a snap at comic-con last month .
read the full story .
author: LA Times

documents.title: breakingcilla death accidental
text: singer cilla black died accidentally from a traumatic head injury after a fall at her home in spain , a coroner has ruled .
during a brief hearing at liverpool coroner 's court , andre rebello recorded a verdict of accidental death .

documents.title: news round-up
text: here are a few entertainment- and arts-related stories our colleagues around the uk have been reporting on .

here 's what you 've been telling us .

documents.title: we 're off to see the wizard
text: nbc 's musical
rapper common , singer ne-yo and hairspray actor elijah kelley have joined the wizard of oz spin-off .
ne-yo will play the tin man , with kelley as the scarecrow .
common will play the bouncer , who is the gatekeeper of the entrance to the emerald city .
they join the already announced mary j blige , queen latifah , glee star amber riley and orange is the new black star uzo aduba .
the production will be broadcast in the us on 3 december .
author: Entertainment Weekly

documents.title: pink floyd 'done ' says gilmour
text: david gilmour has confirmed that pink floyd are no longer together and will not reform in the future .
`` it has run its course , we are done , '' he told

the guitarist and singer had already signalled the band 's days were numbered , telling the bbc last year its most recent album , the endless river , would be `` the last thing that 'll be out from us '' .
gilmour said it would `` just be wrong '' to continue the group without keyboard player rick wright , who died in 2008 and in whose honour the endless river was released .

documents.title: 'thrilled and excited '
text: here 's what paloma faith has to say about her new role as a coach on bbc one 's the voice .
i 'm really excited about working with creative people who are there not just to be great singers , but also innovative personalities and performers .
i 'm really looking forward to getting my teeth into something that cultivates the talents of another person and takes the focus off myself for a bit .
boy george has also revealed what he hopes to get out of his new role on the bbc one talent search .
i 'm thrilled and excited to be a coach on the voice uk .
i 'm a huge fan of the show and have watched and engaged with it from series one .
if i can help someone to win i will be delighted .
what a wonderful opportunity to share my experiences and help someone move forward with their musical career .
i ca n't wait to sit in that chair !
the voice will be back , spinning chairs and all , in january 2016 .

documents.title: piracy case hits stumbling block
text: an australian court has blocked a us company from accessing details of customers who illegally downloaded the film dallas buyers club , unless it pays a a $ 600,000 ( £ 283,000 ) bond .
dallas buyers club llc ( dbc ) , which owns the rights to the 2013 matthew mcconaughey film , is trying to seek compensation from people who pirated the movie .
the court said it set such a high bond to ensure dbc will not make a profit and only send invoices for the cost of a legitimate copy of the film .

documents.title: breakingboy george and paloma faith join the voice
text: boy george and paloma faith are to join the coaching panel of the voice , filling chairs most recently occupied by rita ora and sir tom jones .
ricky wilson and will.i.am will still be in the other two revolving seats when the show returns to bbc one for its fifth season next year .
faith previously appeared on the voice as a guest mentor , working with acts coached by the script 's danny o'donoghue in 2012 .

documents.title: you can call him al
text: music producer al schmitt has become the latest entertainment figure to receive a star on the hollywood walk of fame .
one of the most celebrated recording and mix engineers in the business , schmitt has won more grammys - 23 - than anyone else in his field .
sam cooke , barbra streisand and sir paul mccartney are just a few of the music stars with whom he was worked over the course of a career that has spanned more than half a century .
the 85-year-old was joined by producer don was and musician joe walsh at thursday 's dedication ceremony , fittingly held outside the los angeles headquarters of capitol records .

documents.title: and the grant goes to
text: hollywood veteran jane fonda , fifty shades of grey star dakota johnson and breaking bad 's bryan cranston were just some of the notables who gathered last night to help the organisers of the golden globes dole out grants to non-profit arts organisations .
actor jake gyllenhaal and rapper ice cube were also on hand to see the hollywood foreign press association ( hfpa ) distribute $ 2m ( £ 1.28m ) to worthwhile causes .
halle berry and benicio del toro got a chance to catch up at the event , eight years on from appearing together in things we lost in the fire .
newly naturalised us citizen emily blunt , above with husband john krasinski , was among those to have problems with the teleprompter .
`` i 'm amazed how blind i am , '' she squinted at the beverly wilshire hotel in los angeles .

documents.title: he 's fired !
text: he may have done the hiring and firing on the us version of the celebrity apprentice , but now donald trump has been shown the door on the nbc programme .
the network cut ties with the businessman and republican presidential candidate in june over comments he made about mexican immigrants .
nbc said the show would not be back this year but would return in the future with a new host .

documents.title: nice wok if you can get it
text: the first trailer for burnt - formerly known as adam jones - has hit the net , offering bradley cooper fans a taste of his new cookery-themed drama .
the coop plays a celebrated chef who , after coming a cropper in paris , moves to london to revive his stalled career .
emma thompson and sienna miller feature in the promo alongside various london landmarks , one of them just a stone 's throw from the bbc 's broadcasting house hq .
you could have popped in and said hello , bradley .
tsk .

documents.title: waitress heads for broadway
text: the release of the 2007 comedy waitress was inevitably overshadowed by the death of its writer and director adrienne shelly , who was
eight years on , shelly 's film has a new life as a musical that is set to transfer to broadway next year after a

singer sara bareilles , ( above next to a 2004 of shelly ) , has written the music and lyrics for the show , which tells of a small-town waitress who finds an escape from her loveless marriage in a secret romance .
previews begin on broadway next march

documents.title: now this is a story
text: will smith is reportedly in the early stages of developing a fresh prince of bel-air-style comedy .
but do n't get too excited fresh prince fans - it wo n't be a straight revamp of the original '90s series that made smith a star .
although it will still focus on a fish-out-of-water character , it will be a new show with different characters .
we 're betting jayden or willow smith may have a starring role in it
as the fresh prince theme tune is probably in your head now , here 's another look at the great rendition will smith and gary barlow gave on the graham norton show a couple of years ago .
read the full story .
author: Variety magazine

documents.title: u.n.c.l.e . meets auntie
text: how do you go about reinventing a classic '60s tv show as a blockbuster movie franchise ?
if you 're tom cruise , you get the mission : impossible series .
if you 're uma thurman , you end with with notorious 1998 flop
british director guy ritchie will be hoping his new `` reboot '' of the man from u.n.c.l.e .
avoids the fate of the latter when it reaches cinemas this weekend .
find out what the film 's stars , henry `` superman '' cavill ( and armie `` lone ranger '' hammer , had to say about this big new release when they met the man from auntie .

documents.title: homer 's iliad uncut
text: more than 60 actors are taking part in a live reading of homer 's epic poem the iliad which kicked off at 09:00 bst at the british museum in london .
simon russell beale was first behind the lectern in the marathon reading , which is being live streamed on the almeida theatre 's website .
simon callow , brian cox , mark gatiss and tim pigott-smith are just some of the many artists involved in the project , which will culminate later on the almeida 's stage .
it 's all part of the venue 's almeida greeks festival , which began with an acclaimed production of aeschylus ' oresteia that transfers to the west end next week .

documents.title: riri joins the voice us
text: rihanna is to join the voice us as a key adviser to all the coaches on its upcoming ninth series .
blake shelton , adam levine and pharrell williams will return as mentors , along with gwen stefani - who previously served as a coach on season seven .
levine and the singing competition 's host , carson daly , have welcomed the new recruit on twitter .
the new series of the voice begins in the us on 21 september .

documents.title: fallon extends tonight show gig
text: despite only hosting the tonight show for 18 months , comedian jimmy fallon has had his contract extended until 2021 .
since taking over from jay leno , fallon has brought in a younger audience with his mix of celebrity sketches and games .
`` the tonight show has always been an institution , but he 's remade it into a destination for the largest audience anywhere in late night , '' said nbc chairman bob greenblatt .
the programme is the top-rated late night talk show on us tv , averaging 3.8 million viewers .

documents.title: get involved
text: got something to tell us or something to share ?
feel free to get in touch by tweeting
author: Neil Smith
Arts reporter

documents.title: good morning
text: it 's friday !
if it 's grey and drizzly where you are - as it is here - fear not , as we have eight hours ' worth of entertainment and arts news to brighten up your day .
if you missed what happened yesterday ,
author: Genevieve Hassan
Entertainment reporter
